newsitem.title: MEXICO: Televisa to extend debt exchange offer.
newsitem.headline: Televisa to extend debt exchange offer.

text.p: Mexico's Grupo Televisa said on Monday it had extended the deadline on its programme to exchange private debt for public debt to 5 p.m. EDT (2100 GMT) August 30.
Televisa said some $871 million of $970 million in debt had been exchanged as of August 23, the original deadline for the exchange.

The media giant said it had outstanding $200 million in senior notes due May 15, 2003 with an 11.375 percent coupon, $200 million in series B senior notes due May 15, 2006 with a 11.875 percent coupon, and $570 million in senior discount debentures due May 15, 2008 with a 13.25 percent coupon.
